about_the_game:
WARNING! This demo is out of date and soon will be replaced with new one. More info, in community section.

Controls in demo version:

WSAD - drive
P - pause
Q and E - change the music between rock and EDM

If your car won't move go to options (P) and reset controls. I have no idea why it is happening. This page will be edited after Steam Next Fest ends.
